00042    template <int N>
00043    class Group
00044    {
00045 
00046    public: 
00047 
00051       Group()
00052        : typeId_(-1),
00053          id_(-1),
00054          nPtr_(0)
00055       {
00056          for (int i=0; i < N; ++i) {
00057             atomIds_[i]  = -1;
00058             atomPtrs_[i] = 0;
00059          }
00060          plan_.clearFlags();
00061       }
00062             
00066       void clear()
00067       {
00068          typeId_ = -1;
00069          id_ = -1; 
00070          nPtr_ = 0;
00071          for (int i=0; i < N; ++i) {
00072             atomIds_[i]  = -1;
00073             atomPtrs_[i] = 0;
00074          }
00075          plan_.clearFlags();
00076       }
00077    
00083       void setId(int id)
00084       {  id_ = id; }
00085    
00091       void setTypeId(int typeId)
00092       {  typeId_ = typeId; }
00093    
00100       void setAtomId(int i, int atomId) 
00101       {  atomIds_[i] = atomId; }
00102     
00109       void setAtomPtr(int i, Atom* atomPtr)
00110       {
00111          if (atomPtr == 0) {
00112             UTIL_THROW("Attempt to set null pointer");
00113          }  
00114          if (atomPtrs_[i] == 0) {
00115             ++nPtr_;
00116          }
00117          atomPtrs_[i] = atomPtr; 
00118       }
00119     
00125       void clearAtomPtr(int i)
00126       {
00127          if (atomPtrs_[i] != 0) {
00128             --nPtr_;
00129             atomPtrs_[i] = 0; 
00130          }
00131       }
00132   
00136       Plan& plan()
00137       {  return plan_; }
00138 
00139       // Accessors
00140  
00144       int id() const
00145       {  return id_; }
00146    
00150       int typeId() const
00151       {  return typeId_; }
00152    
00158       int atomId(int i) const
00159       {  return atomIds_[i]; }
00160     
00166       Atom* atomPtr(int i) const
00167       {  return atomPtrs_[i]; }
00168     
00172       int nPtr() const 
00173       {  return nPtr_; }
00174    
00178       const Plan& plan() const
00179       {  return plan_; }
00180 
00181    private:
00182       
00184       Atom*  atomPtrs_[N];
00185    
00187       int  atomIds_[N];
00188    
00190       int  typeId_;
00191    
00193       int  id_;
00194 
00196       int  nPtr_;
00197 
00198       // Communication plan.
00199       Plan plan_;
00200

00202 
00203       friend std::istream& operator >> <> (std::istream& in, Group<N> &group);
00204       friend std::ostream& operator << <> (std::ostream& out, const Group<N> &group);
00205 
00206    };

00234    // Friend operator implementations.
00235 
00236    /* 
00237    * Input a Goup<N> from an istream, without line breaks.
00238    */
00239    template <int N>
00240    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, Group<N> &group)
00241    {
00242       in >> group.id_;
00243       in >> group.typeId_;
00244       for (int i=0; i < N; ++i) {
00245          in >> group.atomIds_[i];
00246       }
00247       return in;
00248    }
00249    
00250    /* 
00251    * Output a Group to an ostream, without line breaks.
00252    */
00253    template <int N>
00254    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Group<N> &group) 
00255    {
00256       out.width(10);
00257       out << group.id_;
00258       out.width(10);
00259       out << group.typeId_;
00260       for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00261          out.width(10);
00262          out << group.atomIds_[i];
00263       }
00264       return out;
00265    }
